Nodes.Comment: Note: Part1 and Part2 nodes are split up, to reduce nesting in the scene file.

Children.Title: Rest
Children.Tooltip: It's a relatively safe, if bouncy, ride.

Nodes.Comment: Quick hack for disabling Shaft3 room text

Children.Title: Ethel
Children.Tooltip: Ask him who he is to this gang.

Children.Title: Randall
Children.Tooltip: Ask him about the boss himself.

Children.Title: Uh-oh
Children.Tooltip: Oops.

Children.Title: Plans
Children.Tooltip: Ask him about the gang's plans.

Children.Title: Amber
Children.Tooltip: Ask him what all the fuss is about with amber.

Children.Title: Search More
Children.Tooltip: It's worth the time and effort, surely...

Children.Title: Workbench
Children.Tooltip: Search the workbench for interesting samples.

Children.Title: Maps
Children.Tooltip: Search the desk with scrolls and maps.

Children.Title: Desk
Children.Tooltip: Search the paperwork on the desk.

Children.Title: Shelves
Children.Tooltip: Search the sparse archives and shelves.

Children.Title: Journal
Children.Tooltip: Read the loose journal page.

Children.Title: Search
Children.Tooltip: Rummage through the barrels to find something of value.

Children.Title: Journal
Children.Tooltip: Read what little you can from the crumbling journal.

Children.Title: Journal
Children.Tooltip: Read the lonely journal page.

ScriptAction.Script:
SetCurrentRoom("Room_Shaft1")
SaveData.TakeCheckpoint(true)

if not Storage.GetFlag("MQ05_MAW_ROOM_SHAFT1_CART_FIRST") then
    Storage.SetFlag("MQ05_MAW_ROOM_SHAFT1_CART_FIRST", true)
    Log("MQ05_MAW_ROOM_SHAFT1_CART_FIRST")
end

Children.Title: Minecart
Children.Tooltip: Try dislodging the minecart.

ScriptAction.Script:
SetCurrentRoom("Room_Shaft2")
SaveData.TakeCheckpoint(true)

if Storage.GetFlag("MQ05_MAW_CART_RELEASED") then
    -- Discuss broken gate
    if not Storage.GetFlag("MQ05_MAW_ROOM_SHAFT2_GATE2") then
        Storage.SetFlag("MQ05_MAW_ROOM_SHAFT2_GATE2", true)
        Log("MQ05_MAW_ROOM_SHAFT2_GATE2")
    end
elseif not Storage.GetFlag("MQ05_MAW_ROOM_SHAFT2_GATE1") then
    -- Discuss gate being in the way
    Storage.SetFlag("MQ05_MAW_ROOM_SHAFT2_GATE1", true)
    Log("MQ05_MAW_ROOM_SHAFT2_GATE1")
end

Children.Title: Chest
Children.Tooltip: Open the chest.

Children.Title: Break Chest
Children.Tooltip: [Strength] Force the chest open by breaking the lock by paw.

Children.Title: Use Crowbar
Children.Tooltip: Use the crowbar to open the chest.

Children.Title: Shelves
Children.Tooltip: Inspect the bookcases.

Children.Title: Satchel
Children.Tooltip: Search the small leather satchel.

Children.Title: Leave
Children.Tooltip: Best leave this thing for what it is.

Children.Title: Touch
Children.Tooltip: Or you could be an utter fool, if you want.

ScriptAction.Script:
SaveData.TakeCheckpoint(true)
if SaveData.IsRestoringGame() then
    Storage.SetFlag("MQ05_MAW_ROOM_COLLAPSED_DONE", true)
    Log("MQ05_ENCOUNTER_SLIME_RELOAD")
else
    Log("MQ05_ENCOUNTER_SLIME2")
end

Children.Title: Leave
Children.Tooltip: There is nothing for you here.

Children.Title: Journal
Children.Tooltip: Read the journal page.
